rawLines.text: So Li Liz, maybe started with you. So a

Absolutely. And thanks so much for
having us and and for this great summit.
So wonderful to be here with all of you.
DIU Defense Innovation Unit uh is the
organization and the department whose
job is to bring commercial dual-use
technology into the department and with
speed and scale for strategic effect for
the war fighter. Um what what that
practically means is we work handinhand
with the combatant commands to really
understand what are the war fighting
needs that they have that commercial

have portfolios, technology portfolios
in in multiple different areas that are

that quite frankly, you know, the
